name: STARDROP
description: When John and Aryn take on a seemingly routine salvage mission they could have never guessed what they would find. As Aryn boards the mysterious ship she quickly learns that this old yet highly advanced vessel will send her on an adventure that will change her life forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.00 GHz / AMD CPU 3 GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: 1GB (AMD Radeon HD 7970 or Nvidia GeForce 1060) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (8.1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 2.5 GHz / AMD CPU 3,5 GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM Graphics: 2GB (AMD GPU: AMD Radeon R9 200 Series or Nvidia GPU: Nvidia GeForce 1080) DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 15 GB available space
